src: ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) LP : Where is room 17 ? # request ( location ( room_17 ) ) [start] ARI : The examination room is on the second floor . You just have to go to the counter on the left and then a nurse will come and take care of you . [MASK] RC : How do I get to room 17 ? Do I have to take the lift ? [MASK] ARI : The examination room is on the second floor . You just have to go to the counter on the left and then a nurse will come and take care of you . The lifts are at the entrance on the left . [MASK] LP : How long before my appointment ? [MASK] RC : ARI , can you ... sorry ... He is n't responding . [MASK] RC : ARI ? ARI : I 'll call a nurse to come and inform you . [MASK] [end] RC : ARI , I do n't have a watch , is there a clock in the room so I can find out the time ? # request ( time ) ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . You have to go to the reception . # cant-help ( ) ; suggest ( going-to ( reception ) )

src: ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) RC : I 'd like to have something with my friend who is sick . Is there a cafeteria ? # request ( location ( cafe ) ) ARI : There are a few options available as part of your visit , and there 's also a cafeteria on the ground floor . Lunch will be offered at midday if you have afternoon appointments . A snack may be offered after your appointment with the nurse . # inform ( location ( cafe ) ) [start] RC : Thank you . [MASK] ARI : Thank you . [MASK] LP : Hello Mr Robot . I 'm looking for the lifts please . [MASK] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . [MASK] LP : Thank you . [MASK] ARI : Thank you . [MASK] RC : Hello , I 'd like to go to the cardiology department . I was told it was on the second floor . Is there a lift to get there ? To go up ? [MASK] ARI : Yes , absolutely . [MASK] RC : And can you tell me where it is please ? [MASK] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . RC : Ok , thank you . [MASK] ARI : Thank you . [MASK] LP : Hello , can we have something to eat here ? [MASK] ARI : Yes , absolutely . Lunch will be offered at midday if you have afternoon appointments . A snack may be offered after your appointment with the nurse . [MASK] LP : Oh , how lucky , thank you . [MASK] [end] ARI : Thank you . # thank ( )

src: LC : Hello . # greet ( ) ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) [start] LC : We 're looking for a way to get to room 17 , are n't we ? [MASK] RP : Yes . [MASK] RP : Yes , we need to go to room 17 for treatment . [MASK] ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . [MASK] LC : Thank you . [MASK] RP : Thank you . [MASK] LC : Do you , do you know what time our appointment is ? [MASK] RP : Do you need the name ? ARI : You 'll have several appointments with different health professionals , at least three . First , a nurse will ask you questions about your health and carry out an initial assessment of your current condition . Next , you will discuss your difficulties with a neuropsychologist who will suggest tests to assess your abilities as accurately as possible . Then , you will see a geriatrician who will summarise all this data and suggest different types of follow-up depending on your results . [MASK] RP : Thank you , but I ca n't hear very well . Could n't you speak a little louder ? [MASK] ARI : Sorry , but I ca n't help you . [MASK] [end] LC : Ok. # acknowledge ( ) RP : Thank you . # thank ( ) ARI : You 're welcome , I 'm here to answer your questions . # offer-help ( ) LC : Thank you ARI , have a nice day . # thank ( ) ; bye ( ) RP : Thank you . # thank ( ) ARI : Thank you , see you around , have a nice day . # thank ( ) ; bye ( )
tgt: LC : We 're looking for a way to get to room 17 , are n't we ? # request ( directions ( room_17 ) ) RP : Yes . # affirm ( ) RP : Yes , we need to go to room 17 for treatment . # request ( directions ( room_17 ) ) ARI : You have to enter the second building behind you . Then it 's the second door on the left . # inform ( directions ( room_17 ) ) LC : Thank you . # thank ( ) RP : Thank you . # thank ( ) LC : Do you , do you know what time our appointment is ? # request ( appt ( time ) ) RP : Do you need the name ? ARI : You 'll have several appointments with different health professionals , at least three . First , a nurse will ask you questions about your health and carry out an initial assessment of your current condition . Next , you will discuss your difficulties with a neuropsychologist who will suggest tests to assess your abilities as accurately as possible . Then , you will see a geriatrician who will summarise all this data and suggest different types of follow-up depending on your results . # inform ( appt ( general_info ) ) RP : Thank you , but I ca n't hear very well . Could n't you speak a little louder ? # thank ( ) ; change-volume ( turn_up ) ARI : Sorry , but I ca n't help you . # cant-help ( )

[MASK] RP : Ok , thank you . [MASK] RP : So , another question ... LC : Um , hello . Do you know where the toilets are ? [MASK] [end] ARI : Very easy ! src: ARI : Hello . I 'm ARI the robot . Can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) RP : I have an appointment . Because ARI : Yes . # affirm ( ) RP : I have two appointments in a row . [start] ARI : Yes , absolutely . [MASK] RP : Ok well , thank you . That 's a shame then . [MASK] ARI : Thank you . [MASK] LC : Um , hello . Could you help me ? [MASK] ARI : Yes . [MASK] LC : Um , can you tell me where I can get a coffee please ? [MASK] LC : You know , I 'd really like a coffee . [MASK] ARI : There are a few options available as part of your visit , and there 's also a cafeteria on the ground floor . [MASK] LC : Thank you . [MASK] ARI : Thank you . See you soon . [MASK] RP : Can you [MASK] ARI : Have a nice day . [MASK] RP : repeat what you said about coffee ? I did n't hear it very well . [MASK] ARI : There are a few options available as part of your visit , and there 's also a cafeteria on the ground floor . [MASK] RP : And , can a patient accompany me or can I accompany a patient to the cafeteria ? ARI : Yes . Of course . [MASK] RP : Ok . Thank you . [MASK] ARI : Thank you . See you around . [MASK] RP : In the cafeteria [MASK] ARI : Have a nice day . [MASK] RP : do they serve food too or just drinks ? [MASK] ARI : Yes , absolutely . [MASK] RP : And what time does the cafeteria close ? [MASK] ARI : It 's at 11 o'clock . src: LP : Hello ARI . # greet ( ) ARI : Hello , my name is ARI . How can I help you ? # greet ( ) ; inform ( ari ( name ) ) ; offer-help ( ) [start] LP : Ask how ... [MASK] RC : Hello . I 'd like to have a small meal , can you tell me where we should go ? [MASK] ARI : There are a few options available as part of your visit , and there 's also a cafeteria on the ground floor . [MASK] RC : Can you tell me when the cafeteria opens ? [MASK] ARI : From 11 AM to 4 PM . [MASK] RC : From 11 AM to 4 PM , is that right ? [MASK] ARI : Yes , you 're right . [MASK] RC : Thank you . [MASK] ARI : You 're welcome , I 'm here to answer your questions . [MASK] RC : Is the cafeteria wheelchair accessible ? Because my friend is in a wheelchair and he ca n't get around by himself . [MASK] ARI : Yes , absolutely . [MASK] RC : Thank you . [MASK] LP : Hmm , ARI , could you tell me how to get to the cafeteria ? [MASK] ARI : There 's a cafeteria on the ground floor , near the courtyard . [MASK] RC : ARI , could you tell me if my appointment is at 11 AM ? [MASK] ARI : Sorry , I do n't have this information . You have to go to the reception . LP : He might know how to get there . LP : Can you tell me how to get to the reception ? [MASK] ARI : The reception is just behind me . Remember to take a ticket on your right . [MASK] RC : Ah , thank you . [MASK] LP : It 's quite simple . Thank you ARI . [MASK] ARI : You 're welcome . I 'm here to answer your questions . [MASK] LP : It would be nice if we knew how to take the lift . LP : ARI , could you tell us how to get to the lift ? [MASK] [end] ARI : The lifts are at the entrance on the left . # inform ( location ( lifts ) ) LP : Do these lifts take us to the cafeteria , or do we have to take something else ? ARI : I 'm sorry , but I ca n't help you . # cant-help ( ) RC : Is the cafeteria on the ground floor ? # request ( location ( cafe ) ) ARI : Yes , you 're right . # affirm ( ) RC : So we do n't have to take the lift to get to the cafeteria ? ARI : No , you do not . # disaffirm ( ) RC : Thank you . # thank ( ) LP : Thank you very much ARI . # thank ( ) ARI : You 're welcome , thank you , see you later and have a nice day . # thank ( ) ; bye ( )
